Description_lang: Rested experience consumed is reduced by ${-1*$s1}%.

description_blz.en_US: Rested experience consumed is reduced by 30%.
description_blz.es_MX: La experiencia por descanso se consume un 30% más despacio.
description_blz.pt_BR: Experiência por descanso consumida reduzida em 30%.
description_blz.de_DE: Verringert den Verbrauch des Ruhebonus um 30%.
description_blz.en_GB: Rested experience consumed is reduced by 30%.
description_blz.es_ES: El consumo de la experiencia por descanso se reduce un 30%.
description_blz.fr_FR: La consommation du bonus à l’expérience lorsque vous êtes reposé est réduite de 30%.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce il consumo del bonus all'esperienza fornito dal riposo del 30%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Бонус к опыту после отдыха расходуется на 30% медленнее.
description_blz.zh_TW: 消耗的休息經驗值降低30%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 休息获得的经验值的消耗降低30%。
